alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 3:56PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Natrona County through 430 PM MDT... At 356 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Teapot Rock, which is also 28 miles south of Kaycee, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Teapot Rock around 415 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 209 and 227. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
